channel.title: CVE Feed for Fancy Product Designer -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-4134|2024-08-03T17:16:04.245Z -- fancy%20product%20designer -- fancy%20product%20designer
item.description: The Fancy Product Designer WordPress plugin is vulnerable to SQL Injection due to insufficient escaping and parameterization of the ID parameter found in the ~/inc/api/class-view.php file which allows attackers with administrative level permissions to inject arbitrary SQL queries to obtain sensitive information, in versions up to and including 4.7.4.
